title: Skinny Shrimp Salsa
directions: Combine diced onions, tomatoes, salt and lime juice in a non-reactive bowl and let it sit about 5 minutes. Combine the remaining ingredients in a large bowl, taste for salt and adjust as needed. Refrigerate and let the flavors combine at least an hour before serving.
ingredients: 16 oz cooked peeled shrimp, diced fine
3 tbsp jalapenos, diced fine (more or less to taste)
2 limes, juice of (or more to taste)
